revision.text: {{DYK talk|23 May|2009|{{*mp}}... that the '''[[Battle of Bologna|capture of Bologna]]''' on 21 April 1945 was the last battle of the [[Polish II Corps]]?}} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Military history|class=b|B1=yes|B2=yes|B3=yes|B4=yes|B5=yes|Polish=yes|German=yes|Italian=yes|WWII=yes}} {{WikiProject Poland|class =b | b1 = yes | b2 =yes | b3 = yes | b4 = yes | b5 = yes | b6 = yes |importance = Mid}} {{WikiProject Italy|class=B|importance=mid}} }} == Citations == Sorry, I should have left a rationale behind, since there was only one part which I found questionable in an otherwise well-cited article. I felt that the Winston Churchill quotation:"you are no longer needed", should have an inline citation, since it is a direct quotation. No other concerns on sourcing. --[[User:Patar knight|Patar knight]] - [[User talk:Patar knight|chat]]/[[Special:Contributions/Patar knight|contributions]] 23:25, 20 May 2009 (UTC) :Citation added.--[[User:Piotrus|Piotr Konieczny aka Prokonsul Piotrus]]|[[User_talk:Piotrus| talk ]] 10:43, 21 May 2009 (UTC) == Coverage and accuracy == I had no concerns about the accuracy of the information, but the coverage is heavily centred on the Polish forces. I understand that your sources must be somewhat limited, but some information on non-Polish combatants would help balance the article. Furthermore, the infobox is very sparse on details, in contrast to other B-class articles on Battles. The aftermath section mainly mentions the Allies,and there is no indication of any German losses. The fate of the II Polish Corps is also unclear. Was it disbanded? Used for some garrison duties? --[[User:Patar knight|Patar knight]] - [[User talk:Patar knight|chat]]/[[Special:Contributions/Patar knight|contributions]] 17:41, 24 May 2009 (UTC) :I think you raise good points, I'll see if I can address them in the future, although I am afraid I exhausted the publication I used. --[[User:Piotrus|Piotr Konieczny aka Prokonsul Piotrus]]|[[User_talk:Piotrus| talk ]] 09:45, 25 May 2009 (UTC) ==B-class review== Confirmed for WPPOLAND following MILHIST review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Talk:Battle_of_Bologna&diff=667253452&oldid=574261623]. --[[User:Piotrus|Piotr Konieczny aka Prokonsul Piotrus]]|[[User talk:Piotrus| reply here]] 02:58, 17 June 2015 (UTC)
